/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. On the right side of the street, a construction site is visible, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky dominating the scene. The overall composition of the image suggests a harmonious blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
